town.name: Dark Reef
town.description: The central area for the pirate town of Dark Reef

harbor.name: Dark Reef Port
harbor.description: A messy, yet beautiful harbor. The BlackDragoon is docked and chilling.

bar.name: The Ugly Duckling

bartender.name: bartender
bartender.greeting: Hello Sea Captain, how goes yer adventurin'?

stranger.name: stranger
stranger.greeting: Arrr, I don't know ye stranger. Whatcha be wanting?

bar.description:
A sign labeled "The Ugly Duckling" hangs from rusty chains outside of what looks to be a popular bar location. The door is heavy as you pull it open and are greeted by a classic bar.
 There is a dart board, a bartender, stairs leading down, a lone stranger sitting in the corner, and the smell of ale permeates the area.

cemetery.name: Fair Winds and Following Seas Cemetery

mourner.name: mourner
mourner.greeting: I would like to be left alone right now, please come back later.

cemetery.description: A cemetery that has a mourner crying over a gravestone, a shovel leaning against a cabin, and a nearby crypt with what appears to be an open door.

crypt.name: Ryte Family Tomb

zombie.name: zombie
zombie.greeting: Hello. I seem to have dropped my head. Would you mind handing it to my body for me?

crypt.description: You walk through a stone door to a mausoleum. Standing in front of you appears to be a man, but he seems to be missing his head. You look down to see the head on the ground when the head speaks to you.

island.name: Yarginory Island
island.description: A beautiful, yet creepy little island.
